mapper.select:
SELECT count(*) FROM tb_suggestion s INNER JOIN tb_userinfo ui ON ui.loginID = s.loginID
and s.suggestion_title like concat('%',#{stitle},'%')

SELECT ui.loginID, ui.name, s.suggestion_no, s.suggestion_category, s.suggestion_answered, s.suggestion_title, s.suggestion_content, DATE_FORMAT(s.suggestion_created_at , '%Y-%m-%d') as suggestion_created_at, s.file_no, f.file_origin, f.file_rename, f.file_local_path, f.file_server_path, f.file_size, f.file_extension FROM tb_suggestion s LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_userinfo ui ON ui.loginID = s.loginID LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_file f ON f.file_no = s.file_no WHERE s.suggestion_no = #{pSuggestionNo}

SELECT ui.loginID, ui.name, sr.suggestion_reply_no, sr.suggestion_no, sr.suggestion_reply_content, DATE_FORMAT(sr.suggestion_reply_created_at , '%Y-%m-%d') as suggestion_reply_created_at, sr.file_no, f.file_origin, f.file_rename, f.file_local_path, f.file_server_path, f.file_size, f.file_extension FROM tb_suggestion_reply sr LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_userinfo ui ON ui.loginID = sr.loginID LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_file f ON f.file_no = sr.file_no WHERE sr.suggestion_no = #{pSuggestionNo}
